snippet: A bomb attack blamed on Colombia's leftist guerrillas has shut down the key Cano Limon-Covenas oil pipeline, a source at state-run oil company Ecopetrol which owns the pipeline, said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Key Colombia Oil Pipeline Shut Again by Bomb Attack: Source
headline.main: Key Colombia Oil Pipeline Shut Again by Bomb Attack: Source

lead_paragraph: A bomb attack blamed on Colombia's leftist guerrillas has shut down the key Cano Limon-Covenas oil pipeline, a source at state-run oil company Ecopetrol which owns the pipeline, said on Thursday.
